Error.title: Something went wrong!
Error.description:
We've unfortunately encountered an error.

You can try to reload the page you were visiting.

NotFoundPage.title: Page not found
NotFoundPage.description: Please double-check the browser address bar or use the navigation to go to a known page.

LocaleLayout.title: Keeep - Das CRM Tool für Freelancer

LoginPage.title: Login to your account
LoginPage.description: Enter your email and password below to login

description.success: You will be redirected to your dashboard shortly.
description.error: An error occurred during login. Please check your email and password.

RegisterPage.title: Create a new account
RegisterPage.description: Enter your email and password create your register
RegisterPage.hint: By clicking on Register, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

description.alreadyRegistered: Your email is already registered. You can <login>log in here</login>.
description.success: Please check your mailbox and confirm your email address to complete your registration.

HeroSection.title: A Better Home for Your Contacts
HeroSection.description: Your freelance business is built around people. Keeping in touch with clients, finding promising leads, chatting with peers. Keeep helps you manage that. A CRM for freelancers, centered around relationships.

waitlist.hint: Sign up to be one of the first to get access to Keeep.

import.title: One-Click Imports
import.description: Import contacts with avatar and details from LinkedIn with just one click. No copy-pasting.

contacts.title: Organize Your Network
contacts.description: Add custom fields to group contacts by expertise, relationship, or whatever else.

linkedin.title: LinkedIn Insights
linkedin.description: Make new interesting connections by finding people who show interest in your posts.

automation.title: Smart Reminders
automation.description: "Let's catch up next month." is easier said than done. Never drop the ball again with reminders.

notes.title: Rich Notes & Templates
notes.description: Attach notes and meeting minutes to contacts. Use templates to save time.

dashboard.title: Make It Yours
dashboard.description: Your customizable dashboard helps you stay on top of things. See what's important to you.

Waitlist.title: Great to have you on board!
Waitlist.description: You are now officially part of the Keeep waitlist. We will notify you as soon as you have access to Keeep.
Waitlist.shareDescription: Share Keeep with your friends and get one month of free access for each friend who registers via your link.

description.alreadyRegistered: Your email is already on the waitlist. You will be notified as soon as you have access to Keeep.
description.success: Please check your mailbox and confirm your email address to complete your registration.
description.error: An error occurred. Please try again later.
description.confirmationFailed: Your email address could not be confirmed. Please try again later.
description.copied: Your personal invitation link has been copied to your clipboard.

mail.subject: Please confirm your registration for the Keeep waitlist
mail.body:
Hello,

Please confirm your registration for the Keeep waitlist by clicking <link>here</link>.

Best regards,
Your Keeep Team
